item.title: Details of US-Russia talks on Ukraine won't be published, Kremlin says
item.description: The details of talks between the U.S. and Russia that took place in Saudi Arabia on Monday will not be made public, Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov...

item.title: Democrats host town halls to fire up supporters -- but is their message resonating?
item.description: Town halls are among the strategies that Democrats are using to try to get their base fired up against the Trump White House.

item.title: Messages with Yemen war plans shared with reporter appears 'authentic': Official
item.description: Members of the Trump administration coordinated highly sensitive Yemen attack plans on an unsecure group chat, a White House official confirmed.

item.title: House Republicans eye hearings on Judge Boasberg, bill to rein in federal judges
item.description: As President Donald Trump's battle with the judiciary escalates, House Republicans are eyeing ways to rein in judges from blocking parts of his agenda...
